DOC.brief_summary: Spinal morphine widely provide acute postoperative analgesia . However , analgesic effect spinal morphine usually last 12-24 hour . Therefore investigator interested pain characteristic 2nd postoperative day . The investigator also explore regimen pain therapy hospital .
DOC.brief_title: Pain Prevalence After Cesarean Section Siriraj Hospital
